text.content:
Armor Smash

You deal the attack's normal damage to your armor, applying Hardness.

Melee

Lost Grip

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 2} until the end of your next turn.

Ranged

Battered

Until healed, you take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: -2 circumstance penalty to checks and saving throws until healed]{-2 circumstance penalty to checks and saving throws}.

Unarmed

Unexpected Blast

Your spell affects all targets within 30 feet of you. You are immune to this effect.

Spell
